ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | cxp0d.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |

| 3 |  | cxpefd.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |

| 5 |  | #P_cxpadd | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 ) /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( A ^c ( B + C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) x. ( A ^c C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl211anc | |- ( ph -> ( A ^c ( B + C ) ) = ( ( A ^c B ) x. ( A ^c C ) ) ) |
